about_the_game:
Build your own dungeon-keeping levels: sculpt terrain; place rooms; spawn minions, items and heroes. Build maps for almost every mode, script events, and swap out terrain themes. Set mutators to alter gameplay, and even link maps into custom campaigns. Share your creations on the Steam Workshop!

Powerful Tools in Your Hand of Evil
Shape the terrain, place rooms, drop defences and hide artefacts; spawn minions and heroes, and manipulate their factions and combat levels; use powerful mirroring tools to replicate entire quadrants of the map and expedite construction.

Choose Your Mode, Build Your Campaign
Create maps for nearly every mode: Skirmish, Scenarios, My Pet Dungeon, Multiplayer, King of the Underhill, Core Shards! Chain maps together within the game to create narrative campaigns with a real sense of progression.

Wield the Mighty Script Editor
Augment your maps with complex scripting in the Mighty Script interface. Set conditions and trigger events, voice lines, enemy patrols and more, to create maps as complex as those seen in our campaigns.

Mutate the Gameplay
Mutators let you customise a map further by controlling core functionality, such as the rate at which gold and mana are gained, the types of minions that can spawn, and which Aspects are available in the Veins of Evil. Save these with your map so users have the preferred settings when they experience your creation.

Paint the Dungeon Red
Recast the terrain from the standard earthy look into the fleshy bloodbath of the Sanguine theme, the whiteout of the Snowy theme, or the abyss-dark Onyx theme.

Please Note:
The Mighty Script section within the Map Editor is only available in English. However, the rest of the Map Editor is available in all supported languages.
detailed_description:
Build your own dungeon-keeping levels: sculpt terrain; place rooms; spawn minions, items and heroes. Build maps for almost every mode, script events, and swap out terrain themes. Set mutators to alter gameplay, and even link maps into custom campaigns. Share your creations on the Steam Workshop!

Powerful Tools in Your Hand of Evil
Shape the terrain, place rooms, drop defences and hide artefacts; spawn minions and heroes, and manipulate their factions and combat levels; use powerful mirroring tools to replicate entire quadrants of the map and expedite construction.

Choose Your Mode, Build Your Campaign
Create maps for nearly every mode: Skirmish, Scenarios, My Pet Dungeon, Multiplayer, King of the Underhill, Core Shards! Chain maps together within the game to create narrative campaigns with a real sense of progression.

Wield the Mighty Script Editor
Augment your maps with complex scripting in the Mighty Script interface. Set conditions and trigger events, voice lines, enemy patrols and more, to create maps as complex as those seen in our campaigns.

Mutate the Gameplay
Mutators let you customise a map further by controlling core functionality, such as the rate at which gold and mana are gained, the types of minions that can spawn, and which Aspects are available in the Veins of Evil. Save these with your map so users have the preferred settings when they experience your creation.

Paint the Dungeon Red
Recast the terrain from the standard earthy look into the fleshy bloodbath of the Sanguine theme, the whiteout of the Snowy theme, or the abyss-dark Onyx theme.

Please Note:
The Mighty Script section within the Map Editor is only available in English. However, the rest of the Map Editor is available in all supported languages.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT450 512MB or better, ATI 4870HD 512MB or better
  • G3D Mark: 1500
  • Hard Drive: 7GB available space
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones
  • Additional Linux Requirements:
    • glibc 2.14 or later
    • libstdc++6 or later
    • GCC 4.9 or later
    • Only the latest video card drivers are supported
    • OpenGL 3.0 support is required

Full Knowledgebase Article
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 1GB or better, Radeon 8950 HD 1GB or better
  • G3D Mark: 3000
  • Hard Drive: 10GB available space
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones
  • Additional Linux Requirements:
    • glibc 2.14 or later
    • libstdc++6 or later
    • GCC 4.9 or later
    • Only the latest video card drivers are supported
    • OpenGL 3.0 support is required

Full Knowledgebase Article

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT450 512MB or better, ATI 4870HD 512MB or better
  • G3D Mark: 1500
  • Hard Drive: 7GB available space
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones

Full Knowledgebase Article

Due to compatibility issues, 2017 Macbook Pros and onwards which feature Intel Iris graphics are not supported. For more information please view our full article above.
